# Install Packages

```{r}
# Install Packages
install.packages(c("rtweet",
                   "tidyverse"))
```

# Load Packages

```{r}
# Load Library
library(rtweet)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Set API

```{r}
# Auth. (Fill it with your API Key)
token <- create_token(
  app = "____",
  consumer_key = "____",
  consumer_secret = "____",
  access_token = "____",
  access_secret = "____"
)
```

# Set Parameter

```{r}
# Set Parameter
file_name <- "example"
keyword <- "example"
number_of_tweet <- 1000
language <- "en"
take_retweet <- FALSE
```

# Collect Tweet

```{r}
# Collect Tweet
tweet <- search_tweets(keyword,
  n = number_of_tweet,
  include_rts = take_retweet,
  lang = language,
  retryonratelimit = FALSE,
  token = token
)
```

# Simpan Tweet

```{r}
# Save Data as RDS
write_csv(tweet, paste0("data/tweet-", file_name, ".csv"))
```
